entry.title: I Look in People's Windows
entry.summary:
Author: emmacchiatoo

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,556Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Sol Alvarez-Ferrer didn’t come to Gotham to be a headline.She came to observe. New city, new job, and a last name people recognize before they recognize her. Armed with a camera, a notebook, and a habit of noticing what others overlook, Sol begins to map a city that watches back. Gotham doesn’t give itself away easily. Some people notice her.Some linger.Some protect her from the shadows. And once you notice someone—it’s hard to look away.

entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,618Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 147

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid. You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions. They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: In the Lowlight
entry.summary:
Author: magpietendencies (writtenintostars)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,820Chapters: 3/28Kudos: 59

Summary: There’s nothing recognizable about Jason, except maybe the way he zeroes in on you the second you step into the room. He always treated you that way, like you were what he was waiting for, the only reason he even showed up. “Jason.” You say when you remember how to talk again. You’re vaguely aware that you’re digging your nails into your palms. You tell yourself to blink, your eyes beginning to water, but you can’t bring yourself to, afraid you’ll find that Jason won’t be there anymore. “Hey, Mags,” the figure greets you, and it’s the first time anyone’s called you that in years. It makes sense that it would be Jason who uses the nickname. He gave it to you, after all. ~ You and Jason Todd spent your teen years together under Batman's tutelage and Bruce Wayne's care, your bond going much further than any words can describe. Six years after his apparent death, Jason reappears, both of you angry and dejected, teeming with love you don't know what to do with. You missed each other. ~ Updates the first Monday of each month.

entry.title: how soon is now?
entry.summary:
Author: dreamtiming

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,262Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: “I really like you.” You finally assert, but the problem that Kyle picks up on is that it’s not exactly a confession. In fact, it’s more like an expletive that you’re expelling from your body. This is why the smile he bears, sweet and excited, seems to hesitate and falter—but only for the dawning width of a second. When he speaks, there’s a degree of hesitance that inherits that which is not present on his face. “That’s—that’s great.” And from the way that his hands find yours, calloused and warm as they draw you up to him, he means it. He really does—which is why the dread that pools in your stomach is all-the-more consuming. tl;dr: you find someone waiting for you on the other side of your fear. Kyle Rayner/Reader, Jason Todd/Reader

entry.summary:
Author: fruitpunchsamurai222

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,911Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: [You thought about cavities, in your mouth and his, and how it could be transmitted through kissing. It was as intimate as could be - carrying your lover’s bone-eating bacteria in you, having it fester and rot you. entry.title: to mock a killingbird
entry.summary:
Author: rishak

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,016Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Jason gets doused with some of Ivy’s pollen in a fight and the bats drop him off with you to help treat the strange symptoms he’s experiencing. Aka, There aren’t enough Jason x reader fics where it’s not an established relationship, I need the yearning and pure desperation but withholding because you can’t allow yourself to cross that line. reader is afab and no physical description is given besides having enough hair to push out of your face. Flashbacks between some rounds for fluff, because i have a soft heart for loving sex, so i give you them bonding/falling for each other before the incident. About a 23k:17k porn to plot ratio.

entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,221Chapters: 14/20Kudos: 659

Summary: You weren’t looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn’t looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn’t ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier—something that almost feels like home.

entry.title: It shouldn't bother you...
entry.summary:
Author: Honey_bellie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,937Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 12

Summary: You have just moved into Gotham a few months ago, you have a new home, a teaching job at a new school, a new sense of normality. Its true that you ran away from your old life, but that didn't matter anymore...new begginings as they say right? Still you couldn't help but feel something is wrong with this city, shit keeps happening to you and it isn't just for the fact you were in the number one "avoid at all costs living here" city. Maybe because you were definitely getting involved with the wrong people, Red Hood...You should be scared of him, but he keeps showing up at the right times when you need him. But you also had Jason, right? Although you could feel he was keeping some secrets from you, not that you could blame him because you aren't much better...Authors note: Reader is a really unlucky girl when it comes to be put in dangerous situations as you will notice along that way, but now she has a certain someone watching over her. He falls first and harder. There ought to be some angst along the way, they are two broken people learning how to love and be loved. Reader has a mysterious past that will be revealed bit by bit, I'm trying to leave clues so you guys can theorize about it. It is planned to be a long fic.

entry.title: you dream of some epiphany
entry.summary:
Author: BrickwallFairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,644Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 66

Summary: Then, through the voice modulator located in his helmet, the Red Hood goes: “How did you know? How the fuck did you know who I was?”“I – what? I - I didn’t.” It takes a second, just to process who he'd be, because you've spent so long telling yourself to stop holding out for a boy who'd never come back. “You - you’re not Jason, you can’t be.”Or:An AU where your soulmate's last words to you are written on your skin. You thought your life couldn’t get more interesting when you found out your best friend was Robin. You find out you were wrong when you discover your soulmate is Red Hood.
